description: stand and burner, for hot water kettle; stand with 4 feet; ring to hold burner 4-1/4 x 6-3/4\'; burner has ivory-tipped handle to open half-moon shaped vents 2-1/8 x 2-3/4\'; oil vessel is perforated with small holes and fits inside burner 1-7/8 x 1-1/2\'; Holiday Traditions, MacFarlane Room
title: Stand with burner
